caption.p: Monthly variation of observed, simulated and corrected precipitation during 1961~2005 over the Tarim, ( a) and Yangtze. ( b) River Basin. (Note: Black dotted lines are the linear fitting for the annual simulated precipitation during the 1961~2005, black lines are the linear fitting for the annual observed precipitation during the 1961~2005, black short dash lines are the linear fitting for the annual simulated precipitation during the 1961~2005).
